title: shurima art  contest winners
body: can i know what happen with this shurima art contest thing ?????? i got a email then i replied then nothing. if u all not giving any gift thats not a problem at least say that u are not giving any prices for the winners. just starting to hate lol

replies.body:
Hey,

I don't seem to have any record of Ironhunt in my email. Which entry did you submit?

wht i dont get u 
i did an art like xearth in front of sun disc. posted on twitter. twitter name @krishaabi
i got an email form u i replied. yet didnt get any gifts  ?????
my art was in the short list toooo !!!!!! black and white xearth art 
pls check for it pls
The rewards have been added to your account!

Hey!

Thanks for clearing that up. You did not receive an email because we had no email on file as you submitted through twitter. I must have missed your response as it was 4 days after i reached out on twitter. I will get that through to you by Monday afternoon. 

Will update this thread when its done.

this was my art
